short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Herbie is a tool for browser automation and testing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Herbie - Simplify Web Automation Testing

Herbie is a Chrome extension that makes web automation testing effortless. By leveraging Behavior Driven Development (BDD), it allows you to write test cases using simple, everyday language like "click," "type," and "wait." No coding experience required!

Features:

Intuitive Scripting: Write test scripts in plain language.
Keyword Management: Assign friendly names to web elements for easy reference.
Visual Test Recording: Drag and drop actions to create tests without scripting.
Saved Scripts & Logs: Save your tests and export logs for analysis.
Make your web testing process smoother and more efficient with Herbie.

Documentation : https://hrithikmani.github.io/herbie/getting-started/Getting%20Started/
